title: MJ/Steam
description: Do the MJ / Steam upgrade flags refer only to the Pneumatic Generator and Steam upgrades (for consumption as alternate energy sources), or do they refer to the RS-Energy Cell and Steam Tank upgrades as well?  Or are the RS-Energy Cell and Steam Tank classified as "Energy Storage" ("B" flag)?

replies.body: RS cell and Steam tank are probably classified as energy storage (B flag), but it doesn't matter much as whatever machine can accept Pneumatic Generators and Steam upgrades will also accept RS cell and Steam tanks.
I was more concerned about the other way around; if a machine could (in theory) accept B-flag upgrades, but not M or S-flag upgrades.
